transcript:
Customer: Hello? 
Executive: Hello. Haan sir.
Customer: Sir, good evening, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon madam, boliye na.
Customer: Haan sir, bataiye aap to keh rahe the ki batayenge 23 ko aaj to 24 ho gayi sir, kuch bata hi nahi rahe.
Executive: Haan, haan madam, char panch team hai mere paas mein. Isme se dekho na koi bhi confirm ho jayega na to main apni taraf se le leta hu pura order.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Isko kara lijiye sir agar aapka ho jaye ye TrustSeal.
Customer: Mere ko, mere ko madam, suniye na mera account hai na, account lock hai na to account main soch raha tha ki main naam chalak se kara lu. Jo mera purana farm tha na.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Purani farm.
Mera, mera purana farm tha, Vitthal Rukhmai naam se, is naam se mera desh.
Executive: [inaudible] Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan. Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Good afternoon madam. Haan ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Jo mera haan purana jo farm tha na Vitthal Rukhmai naam se to mere ko usi naam se karna tha. Main packaging mein to haan woh uska GST bhi hai mere paas mein sabhi, khali GST chalu karna hai. Aur ye kuch kisi ka complete hai unse mera baat chalu hai. Agar woh clear ho jaye to phir usi naam se chalu kar.
Executive: Kya kis se baat chalu hai sir? Kya, kya chalu hai aapka?
Customer: Matlab packaging ka boliye na, packaging jo abhi badhane ka bole hai na.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, haan.
Customer: To mere ko jo mera purana farm tha Vitthal Rukhmai naam se isme joint tha pehle.
Executive: Kya naam se tha?
Customer: To Vitthal Rukhmai naam se tha madam, Vitthal Rukhmai nursery naam se.
Executive: Achha. Haan.
Customer: To usi naam se mere ko chalu karna hai. Ye naam main Sarthak Traders ka nikal dena hai kyunki us naam se na mere kaafi welder hai. Aur kaafi matlab.
Executive: To achha ye bataiye GST to dono ka alag alag hai na sir, is company ka aur GST unka alag alag hai na?
Customer: Nahi ki GST main alag uska hi dunga GST usi naam se dunga na.
Executive: Haan to wahi bol rahi hu na Sarthak ka alag hai uska alag hai na.
Customer: Haan to main wahi dunga jo pehle de rakha tha maine na.
Executive: Achha. To ye bataiye Sarthak Traders.
Executive: Achha ye bataiye sir, Sarthak mein kya hai? Sarthak mein partner, Sarthak mein to owner name change nahi hona, owner name change nahi hoga usme owner name change.
Customer: Nahi isme ye bataiye jo owner hai Sarthak wale mein kaun hai? Aap hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi Sarthak mein main nahi rakha na woh to unhone rakha hai unhone unke hisab se sabhi deal agreement kar liye unke hisab se sabhi kar liye hai mere ko kuch usme.
Executive: To Sarthak wale mein kaun kaun partner hai? Aap hai usme sir ki nahi hai?
Customer: Haan phir main hu na tabhi to main kar raha hu na phir. Main partner hu tabhi to main hamara partnership abhi. Achha. Jyada aata hai matlab woh chalega nahi isliye main abhi woh soch raha hu ki main mere naam se hi kar lu phir payment to sab main hi bhar raha tha na.
Executive: Hmm. Hello. To dusri wali jo hai woh usme bhi aap, aap woh aapki khud ki ownership hai.
Customer: Haan woh main meri khud ki hai to usi naam se main soch raha hu usi naam se kar lunga main. Uske liye mere ko char panch din ka aur samay lagega. Thoda main GST clear kar lu. Kuch account clear ho jayenge to.
Executive: Achha. To phir aapka ye hai ki usme sir aapka naya samjh rahi hu. Isme kya hota hai sir ye aapka change nahi hota naam. Aapki hum nayi company register karenge us nayi company name se aur GST name se.
Customer: Nahi madam phir mere ko jyada kharcha lag jayega.
Executive: Haan? Isse aage package kitne ka lagega isse?
Executive: Kyunki sir pata hai kya hota hai agar koi company current GST active hai to hum waha pe company ka naam change nahi kar sakte hai. Hume aapki nayi company register karni padti hai waha pe aur jab woh register hoke start ho jayegi to ye jo purani wali company rahegi Sarthak Traders ke naam se.
Customer: Woh to main, main naam se, naye naam se kar lenge. Haan ye close karke hum iska close kar denge. Woh naam se mera, woh naam se mera haan import, import export license bhi us naam se mera.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Isme matlab kya refund kar dete hai?
Executive: Haan haan ye wali woh service start ho jayegi aur ye aapka refund ke liye bhi hum bhej dete hai aage sir.
Customer: Refund nahi usme, usme adjust nahi ho sakta hai uski service.
Executive: Nahi usme adjust nahi hota sir uske liye aapko alag se pay karna hota hai. Woh pura aapka complete new banta hai.
Customer: Isme refund kitna, refund, refund isme kitna ho sakta hai ki agar maan lo ki aap start karte hai.
Executive: Sir woh to on pro rata basis pe hota hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main bata deti hu kitna amount aapko kyunki kya hota hai na on pro rata basis pe hota hai. Ab woh GST jitni jaldi aap usse start karaoge jab woh start hogi uske baad hi hum ye aapka cancel karenge uske pehle tak cancel kar nahi sakte. Nahi to woh aapka kya hai sir product line dono ki same hai sir alag alag hai?
Customer: Product na product to same hi hai. Product same hai khali problem ye hai ki usme partnership hai Sarthak mein. Aur isme partnership nahi hai. Haan aur usme kya hai unko jyada interest nahi hai usme unka to alag kaam hai woh to politician mein hai politician.
Executive: Achha ye bataiye ispe aapka buyer supply conflict dikhai de rahe hai. Buyer supply kuch issue hote to woh kya matlab resolve ho gaye aapke sir kya pehle?
Customer: Kaunse isme?
Executive: Sarthak wale mein.
Customer: Kaunse issue mein? Isme kaunse issue hai abhi isme?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Sarthak mein koi issue nahi hai na madam. Ek piche Ganganagar ka tha woh to main nahi ye kiya tha thoda late ho gaya tha na unko woh refund kar diya maine.
Executive: Hello. Achha nahi yaha pe actually.
Executive: Aapki koi ek company hai yaha pe usse ek company ka link aaya hai ki us company ke link pe aapka default hua hai.
Customer: Matlab?
Executive: Vitthal karke hai na Vitthal.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Rukhmai Nursery Farm.
Executive: Haan haan. Aapko is, is wali company pe service leni hai?
Customer: Haan usme hi chalu karna hai mere ko usme to activate karna hai. Vitthal Rukhmai Nursery pe karni hai chalu.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul madam.
Executive: Lekin sir ispe to apne kya bolte hai kaafi sare buyer supply ke ticket yaha pe iski wajah se company aapki disable kar di hai.
Customer: Sare nahi na ek hi, ek hi buyer ki baki sabhi ka to material main post kar diya hai sabhi ka sab clear hai madam account. Khali woh ek buyer ki wajah se ye ho gaya usko main bola tha ki 24 ghante ke liye rukne ke liye par unhone bhi bahut jald bazi karke.
Executive: Kya naam hai aapka? Liza Trader karke naam se hai Liza Trader.
Customer: Rajasthan, Rajasthan usko, usko to main material bhej diya tha.
Executive: Aur yaha pe aapka comment jo hai woh likha hai closing comment fraud alert supplier.
Customer: Uske line pe, line pe le sakte ho buyer ko aap. Uske ladke ka bhi shadi tha Dubai mein kahi tabhi usko line pe le sakte hai aap abhi.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Main usko hai na pata hai madam do teen, panch, panch saat saal pehle usko main hai na material supply kar diya hai. Panch saat saal pehle khud labour leke main gaya tha 15-20 aadmi leke plantation pura complete kar diya hai. Usne tag hataya nahi pata nahi tag kyun nahi hataya usne phir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Usse main baat kar lunga aage dekhta hu kaise tag woh matlab woh. Usse material to main ye kar diya tha pura complete kar diya tha sabhi madam. Jitna amount ho raha tha na 1 lakh ka amount ko material de diya plantation kar diya aur kya unko chahiye woh.
Executive: Aur sir isko ek call aur aaya tha kuch 7507335068 se call tha. Matlab ye inka naam tha Mansi Bhuse karke Pune ki hai 50,000 ke amount ka pay kiya tha kuch product ke liye par unko mila nahi.
Customer: Mansi Bhuse.
Executive: Mansi Bhuse. Haan. Unko bhi refund kar diya na madam unko unka lagbhag dekhiye na 90, 98,000.
Executive: Sir dekhiye pehle meri baat suniye. Bhale aapne refund kar diya hai par yaha pe.
Customer: 98,000 tha inhone jald bazi mein lock kar dete hai ye log sochte nahi thoda bahut bhi kuch sochte nahi thoda complete kar dete.
Executive: Dekhiye main bol rahi hu ki bhale aapne refund kar diya hai par yaha pe.
Customer: Abhi usko pata hai woh madam ko pata hai main kam se kam 10, do teen check bhi bheja har din baad bhi karta hu main woh.
Executive: Sir meri baat suniye.
Customer: Unko bola ki 24 ghante ke liye activate kar dijiye aur baad mein woh mera hisab se kar lunga phir woh maanti nahi.
Executive: Pehle meri baat suniye. Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Bhale aapka ticket yaha pe close ho gaya hai but yaha pe ye comment update nahi tha ki nahi hai kahi bhi ki aapne amount pay kar diya hai. Sir yaha pe jo comment update hua hai ki already fraud tag mein ye sir ye company to aapki yaha pe matlab high risk suspected mein isko service aap le hi nahi payenge.
Customer: Matlab kya madam?
Executive: Matlab ispe bahut sari kya hota hai sir teen se jyada agar buyer ki koi complaint aa jati hai to.
Customer: Us naam se madam pata hai mere import, import export license kaafi welder us naam se jude hai madam isliye main soch raha hu ki us naam se agar activate ho jaye.
Executive: Sir lekin aap IndiaMART pe us company pe service nahi le paoge kyunki usse bahut sare aapke buyer supply ke ticket open hue the jo ki aapke without resolution hi unhe close karne pade jiski wajah se company aapki disable kar di gayi. To isse to ho nahi.
Customer: Kyunki main sabhi ka close madam sabhi ka aap usse puch lijiye na jo aapka Rajasthan ka tha na ya to unko mail karne ka bol deta hu main. Mail karne ka bol deta hu abhi kyunki woh usme mail kiya nahi us time mein.
Executive: Hello. Sir aap abhi mail mat karaiye. Pehle mujhe ek baar apne senior se baat karne dijiye ki kya karna, kya karna hai.
Customer: Haan kyunki na unhone hai na unhone dekho main unko material bhi de diya tha madam woh lockdown ka time tha phir bhi main kaafi ye kiya phir bhi usne mere sath mein bahut galat kiya us aadmi ne phir bhi main chhod do usko matlab ye kar diya.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jo kaunsa aapne bole na Dungarpur mein hai uska farm Dungarpur mein hai sweet ka kuch dukan hai.
Executive: Sir main ek baar senior se baat karke aati hu phir aapko batati hu sir thik hai. Mujhe ek baar check karna padega sara cheeze.
Customer: Isme dekhiye agar hota hai to phir mere ko usi naam se agar hua madam main dekho import export license banane ka jarurat nahi padega. Sir koi baat nahi sir main baat kar leti hu agar hota hai to thik hai hum karwa denge nahi hoga to phir aap Sarthak wale pe dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Haan thik hai hoga to main naye se aur naye naam se kar dunga kyunki kya hai isme partnership mein bhi woh to politician hai woh bhi mere ko sab ye kar raha hai matlab.
Executive: Sir one second main sir se ek baar baat karke aati hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change company name.

- Wants to activate GST with old company name.

- Wants refund for Sarthak Traders account.

- Facing issues with buyer supply conflict.



Resolution:

- Executive explained new company registration process.

- Executive informed about refund process.

- Executive will check with senior regarding name change.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking with senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, gst, company name, buyer supply
